text: The Grand Prix Cristal Energie is a road bicycle race held annually in France. It was organized as a 1.2 event on the UCI Europe Tour from 2006 to 2009. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Wnner !Second !Third |- | 1984 | Franck Boucanville | Pascal Audoux |
